import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Card, Image, ListGroup, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap-v5' import Message from '../components/Message.js' import { addToReceiptCart, removeFromReceiptCart } from '../actions/receiptActions' const ReceiptCartScreen = ({ match, location, history }) => { const productId = match.params.id const [qty, setQty] = useState(1) const [importPrice, setImportPrice] = useState(0) const dispatch = useDispatch() const receiptCart = useSelector(state => state.receiptCart) const { receiptItems } = receiptCart useEffect(() => { if (productId) { dispatch(addToReceiptCart(productId, importPrice, qty)) } }, [dispatch, productId]) const removeFromCartHandler = (id) => { dispatch(removeFromReceiptCart(id)) } const flag = false const checkoutHandler = () => { receiptItems.forEach(item => { if (item.price >= item.importPrice) { flag = true } }); if(flag = true){ } else{ history.push('/login?redirect=admin/supplier') } } return (

Receipt Cart

{receiptItems.length === 0 ? ( Your receipt cart is empty Go Back ) : ( <>
Product
Sales Price
Import Price
Quantity
 {receiptItems.map((item) => ( {item.name} ${item.price} dispatch( addToReceiptCart(item.product, Number(e.target.value), item.qty) ) }> dispatch( addToReceiptCart(item.product, item.importPrice, Number(e.target.value)) ) }> ))} Keep Import Goods )}

Subtotal ({receiptItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.qty, 0)}) items

$ {receiptItems .reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.qty * item.importPrice, 0) .toFixed(2)} ) } export default ReceiptCartScreen
